foreignData.name: Angriff auf die Bausubstanz
foreignData.text: Zerstöre alle Artefakte. Dann fügt der Angriff auf die Bausubstanz jeder Kreatur Schaden in Höhe der Anzahl an Artefakten zu, die in diesem Zug aus dem Spiel auf Friedhöfe gelegt wurden.

foreignData.name: Assaut structurel
foreignData.text: Détruisez tous les artefacts, puis l'Assaut structurel inflige à chaque créature un nombre de blessures égal au nombre d'artefacts qui ont été mis dans des cimetières depuis le champ de bataille ce tour-ci.

foreignData.name: 構造的突撃
foreignData.text: すべてのアーティファクトを破壊し、その後構造的突撃は各クリーチャーにそれぞれ、このターンに戦場から墓地に置かれたアーティファクトの数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignData.name: 摧朽突袭
foreignData.text: 消灭所有神器，然后摧朽突袭对每个生物各造成伤害，其数量等同于本回合中从战场进入坟墓场的神器数量。

name: Structural Assault
originalText: Destroy all artifacts, then Structural Assault deals damage to each creature equal to the number of artifacts that were put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn.

rulings.text: Structural Assault counts the number of artifacts that were put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn for any reason, not just because they were destroyed by Structural Assault.

If a player controls an artifact creature with a shield counter on it as Structural Assault destroys all artifacts, a shield counter will be removed before Structural Assault deals damage to each creature. Unless that artifact creature has another shield counter on it, the damage won't be prevented.
